Title: A Day in the Death
Plot: A victim of his newfound circumstances, Owen Harper believes he needs absolution. Will the lonely girl on the rooftop help him, or will it be a mission to the retrieve an alien device that is proving more lethal by the second? And how far will Toshiko go to help him?
ParentalRatingReason: R13 Violence,horror scenes and offensive language
GuestStars: Freema Agyeman, Richard Briers, Christine Bottomley, Louis Decosta Johnson, Brett Allen, Gil Kolirin, Paul Kasey
